message.content: Yes, it is mostly safe to combine magnesium and melatonin if you are taking them as supplements for sleep improvement. Both magnesium and melatonin play roles in regulating the sleep-wake cycle. However, since individuals can have different reactions or medical conditions, it's always recommended to consult with your healthcare provider before starting any new supplement regimen. They will be able to provide personalized advice based on your specific health needs and risks associated with combining these supplements.
